data.disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: This response is not professional advice. Please consult licensed professionals for design and building projects.
data.disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: This response is provided for informational purposes only.

rooms.description: Entrance hall with a foyer and cloakroom; designed to welcome guests in accordance with Vastu principles.
Spacious living area for relaxation, furnished with contemporary decor; includes seating arrangements and open space design.
Modern dining area adjacent to the kitchen; ensures ample natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with integrated storage solutions, placed in the southeast for auspicious energy flow.
Small suite for servants; includes a compact bedroom and private bathroom, located near utility areas.

openings.vastu_note: North is considered auspicious for entrance in Vastu design.
East receives morning light, enhancing vibrancy and energy.

other_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool area integrated at the rear of the property, providing recreational space without compromising privacy.
landscaped garden designed to improve air quality and offer relaxation; includes native plants as per local norms.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, ensuring privacy and ample natural light from the east; adheres to Vastu by placing the bed in a north direction.
Additional bedroom suitable for guest use or family members; designed with modern furnishings and access to a balcony.

openings.vastu_note: South is considered less auspicious; careful placement recommended.

rooms.description: Tripled combined studio apartment for creative work, relaxation, or additional living space; designed with open floor plan to encourage social interaction and creativity.
Small service room/office area integrated within the studio layout for practicality; includes storage facilities.

openings.vastu_note: West exposure can be balanced with appropriate interior decor and color scheme as per Vastu practices.

floor_plan.remarks: Design adheres to contemporary aesthetics while incorporating Vastu principles and local building norms; modifications may be needed based on site-specific details.
